Introduction

Song Seungho is a South Korean trainee under Hi-Hat Entertaiment.

On September 26, 2024, he was announced as a contestant on JTBC's survival show PROJECT7, which began airing in October 2024. He successfully secured a spot in the final lineup, placing 5th, and became a member of the group CLOSE YOUR EYES.
